Author: belivets
Text: i mean, they can get recycled, so i don't think it really matters. most of the time they get destroyed just by viture of working in the warehouse, so i imagine they're used to people fucking around with them.   and yeah, i'm thinking i might see if i can adjust them a little bit. i bent down today to pick something off the bottom shelf and i felt like my whole ass was hanging out they slipped down that much.

Author: jackfruitjunkie
Text: Will they ever have to be returned to the company? If not you can tailor them yourself, just search YouTube if you don't know how to sew. It's really simple to make minor adjustments. & if they do need to be returned; if you do a good day enough job modifying your uniform they'll never know.. r/unethicallifeprotips
